session.title: Simulation for L&T Technology Services Synthetic Data Project Contract
session.jurisdiction_note: Contract terms align with Indian IT services regulations, with adjustments for data privacy compliance under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023.

timeline.title: Contract Signing and Initial Data Handover
timeline.description: Execution of agreement and transfer of limited real dataset
timeline.detailed_description: Upon signing, L&T Technology Services provides the initial real dataset for synthetic data generation. The client agrees to pay the first milestone payment within 15 days.
risks: Data privacy non-compliance may lead to penalties

timeline.title: Milestone 1: GAN Implementation Completion
timeline.description: Deadline for GAN architecture deployment and initial synthetic data generation
timeline.detailed_description: By this date, the GAN system must be fully operational, generating synthetic data that passes initial quality checks. Payment of ₹500,000 is due upon successful validation.
risks: Delay in deployment may incur ₹50,000 per week penalty
Quality failure requires rework at client's cost

timeline.title: Milestone 2: Blockchain Integration and Validation
timeline.description: Integration of blockchain for tamper-proof recording and data validation
timeline.detailed_description: Blockchain system must be live, recording all synthetic data generation processes. Payment of ₹750,000 due after successful audit and compliance verification.
risks: Non-compliance with data integrity standards may result in ₹100,000 penalty

timeline.title: Final Delivery and Model Performance Validation
timeline.description: Full synthetic dataset delivery and ML model performance assessment
timeline.detailed_description: Complete synthetic dataset handed over, with demonstrated 30% improvement in model performance as per contract. Final payment of ₹1,000,000 due within 30 days of acceptance.
risks: Performance shortfalls may reduce final payment by up to 50%
